successes.title: Coup Reformation - Kickstarter Edition
successes.description: Thank you for making this special edition of the upcoming Coup expansion a reality.

Pledges.description: One copy of the Reformation KS Edition - US Shipping. Add $12 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.
One copy of the Reformation KS Edition - Canadian Shipping. Add $12 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.

One copy of the Reformation KS Edition - International Shipping. Add $15 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.

One copy of the Reformation KS Edition - Brazil, Argentina, Russia Shipping. Add $15 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.
One copy of the Reformation & Coup KS Edition - US Shipping. Add $24 for each additional copy.  See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.

One copy of the Reformation & Coup KS Edition - Canadian Shipping. Add $24 for each additional copy.  See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.

One copy of the Reformation & Coup KS Edition - International Shipping. Add $30 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.

One copy of the Reformation & Coup KS Edition- Brazil, Argentina, Russia Shipping.  Add $30 for each additional copy. See “add-on” section to add more great games from IB&C for very special prices if added to your pledge.
